summary:
This mod adds a follower to Skyrim, Lisa, she can be found in the bannered mare in Whiterun.
This mod does not require you to have any other mods to run but it does support all other mods.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS]Background:
A traveler by the name of Lisa arrives in Whiterun she is a fierce and skilled warrior she uses a Ebony Battleaxe And wears the holds uniform she an also use a bow just as well as the Battleaxe. she offers her service to anyone who asks.[/font]
author: theAngrygamer
